com.teamdev.jxbrowser.chromium.swing

Class DefaultPrintHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.teamdev.jxbrowser.chromium.swing.DefaultPrintHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PrintHandler 

    public class DefaultPrintHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements PrintHandler
    Default implementation of PrintHandler that displays standard Java Print dialog and modify default settings with the settings that end user selects in the dialog. From the print dialog this implementation reads only printer name and update print settings with the selected printer name. Also this implementation enables backgrounds printing.

    If you need to modify this default behavior, then you can create your own implementation of the PrinterHandler and register it using Browser.setPrintHandler(com.teamdev.jxbrowser.chromium.PrintHandler) method.
    PrintHandler的默认实现，它显示标准Java Print对话框，并使用最终用户在对话框中选择的设置来修改默认设置。此实现从打印对话框中仅读取打印机名称，并使用所选打印机名称更新打印设置。同样，该实施方式能够进行背景打印。如果需要修改此默认行为，则可以创建自己的PrinterHandler实现，并使用Browser.setPrintHandler（com.teamdev.jxbrowser.chromium.PrintHandler）方法进行注册。

      PrintStatus onPrint(PrintJob printJob)

    • Method Detail

      • onPrint

        public PrintStatus onPrint(PrintJob printJob)
        Description copied from interface: PrintHandler
        This method is invoked when engine wants to get custom print settings and decide whether it should continue printing or not. If this method throws an exception, then printing will be canceled. This method will not block web browser engine. It's invoked asynchronously. You can display in this method Modal UI Print Dialog to ask user for custom print settings.
        当引擎想要获取自定义打印设置并决定是否继续打印时，将调用此方法。如果此方法引发异常，则将取消打印。此方法不会阻止Web浏览器引擎。它是异步调用的。您可以在此方法中显示“模态UI打印对话框”，询问用户自定义打印设置。
        Specified by:
        onPrint in interface  PrintHandler
        Parameters:
        printJob - active print job. Use it to access default print settings and modify them. -有效的打印作业。使用它来访问默认打印设置并进行修改。
        Returns:
        PrintStatus.CONTINUE to continue printing. PrintStatus.CANCEL to cancel printing. You can return null. In this case it will be equivalent of PrintStatus.CANCEL. 继续打印。取消打印。您可以返回。在这种情况下，它等于。
